All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bonus
A set of bonuses mapping colors to integers.
Card
A splendor card.
CardSource
This interface represents a source of cards, e.g.
Color
The colors used in the game.
Cost
Cost is a map of colors to integers.
Deck
A deck of splendor cards.
Icard
This interface represents a splendor card.
RestLauncher
This class powers up Spring and ensures the annotated controllers are detected.
SplendorDeck
This interface separates the deck from a card source.
